import React, { useState } from 'react' const Signin = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); return

Sign in

setUsername(e.target.value)} type="text" name="username" id="username" placeholder='username or email address' className="text-xl py-2 rounded-full px-4" required /> setPassword(e.target.value)} type="password" name="password" id="password" placeholder='passowrd' className="text-xl py-2 rounded-full px-4" required />

Don't have an account?

} export default Signin;
